website_summaries.verdict: The PeeDar detector is ready to start working straight out of the box, with a minimal learning curve.
pros: UV light spectrum makes dry urine crystals glow
Batteries included, works straight out of box
Does not react to dust, fewer false positives
Can be used under daylight conditions
cons: Works best on fresh urine, not dried stains on darker surfaces

customer_reviews.title: The front spring is soldered to the electronics wafer. ...
customer_reviews.text: The front spring is soldered to the electronics wafer. Solder is not designed to be a structural joint that connects two parts, it is primarily used to ensure an electrical connection between the parts. The spring broke off very quickly. Up until that point, the light worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: S Young

customer_reviews.title: Dosent work for cat pee.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately doesn't work for cat pee. Shows everything else though. I had a spot we knew was cat pee and it didn't illuminate it at all. Not sure why just know it doesn't work. This item is not any different that the other items making the same claims. Also Over Priced in my opinion for what it is. I guess people these days spend more on advertising than creating a good working product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, 110% recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Was a pet trainer & sitter over 10 yrs. Used to recommend handheld black lights. Now use PeeDar 2.0. Works perfectly for urine & organic compounds usung 380-385NM. Bought PeeDar 2.0 thanks to Erica. Here's her link with review & pix.  ***REMEMBER*** Urine does NOT crystallize until dried. NO black light makes WET utine glow. (Try UV with very different NM, laser or high intensity LED. Manipulating angle of light also helps.)
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing lit up everything BUT cat urine. I ended up on my hands and knees sniffing each and every spot, only to find out that nobe of the illuminated spots were urine. I used the light in complete darkness, per instructions. Even when held to spots I KNEW were urine, it would show nothing. It was, however, excellent at finding every coffee drip and beer spill. Its going back.
customer_reviews.author: Reeser214

customer_reviews.title: Amazing what you find!
customer_reviews.text: This item does what it says it will, reveals the sneaky cat urine on the carpet. I smell it, but I can't find it to clean it up. Now I can. In researching these flashlights, I found that this is the one with the right frequency to find cat urine, others may not. Why 4 stars? It seems to reveal more things than just the cat urine but it looks the same under the light. But I don't think my cat marked 5 feet up the wall. The nose test is still required but it points me in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Bright light picks up stains easily....and every piece of lint imaginable.
customer_reviews.text: Well the light works great. It works so well that I'm having a little trouble determining between what is a urine stain and what is some other substance, unless it's in an obvious puddle shape. I guess those clear UV glasses really do make a difference. So, I would have rated this product with 5 stars but when I installed the batteries that came packaged with the flashlight, it did not turn on. I swapped out those batteries for some I already had at home and voila, flashlight works. So, not cool sending me old, dead batteries, seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Uses for the UV Pet Urine Detector
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I had a 6 year old rescue dog that was raised in a puppy mill. He wasn't house trained so we had a big problem. We could smell urine but couldn't find it. This UV detector was amazing. We found the urine on the carpet and also on the furniture. This got me so excited I used it in my bathrooms and kitchen I was blown away with all the bacteria and other contaminates that illuminated when I thought the areas were clean. I cleaned again with a stronger cleaner (Full strength La's Totally Awesome All purpose Cleaner which is also available on Amazon) and then checked with the light. Oh what a difference!!
customer_reviews.author: Starflower

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out, but not happy.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries that came with this were completely dead, so don't consider that a bargain. There were no instructions or guidelines included, so I don't know what we are looking for with this tool: Everything on a carpet that it lights is purple, and I know we don't have that much dog pee in our house! As a landlord, we will be checking an apartment for cat urine with this. I am not confident, but still open-minded.
customer_reviews.author: Ceejay

customer_reviews.title: Visualize everything you should see.
customer_reviews.text: This little ultra-violet flashlight is a gem. It picks up old dog spots very easily. I can also see left behind toothpaste splatters around the sinks. Walk around your house at night and you’ll quickly see what areas need attention. I don’t understand why some would say it’s not very bright. The light is mainly outside of the human visual spectrum. It’s not supposed to be bright to you. But it sure does light up stuff you miss in normal cleaning. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of finding the spot(s) that one of our cats was urinating so I could neutralize the horrific odor. I've tried this product at every angle & in complete darkness but it failed to show anything except dust & where I had used cleaning products. If I could've given this 0 stars I would have. Do not waste your money on this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: m & m

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It doesn't look bright on your hand. But shine it on white or florescent objects and BAM! blinding pics pet stains out like you have super vision. Oh and right after I opened it, it fell and hit the concrete from 3 ft up. No issue. Picked it up and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mrtwstrs

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a black light flash light from Walmart thinking it would work the way the PeeDar light works. It never picked up on any pet stains which I knew were there because I knew about the accidents. After researching some more I found out the light I had was actually too bright to pick up the stains which led me to find the PeeDar. It definitely works as it should and is super easy to use. If you have a pet and need to know if they'd had any accidents this is a product you want to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Hoff

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one! I have bought two black lights previous to this one to try to find cat urine spots, a bar one and a flashlight one. Both were advertised to be used for the purpose. They never even showed me what the fluoresced spots look like. I am in no doubt now because this little light makes it REALLY obvious! It comes with a very helpful ebook of suggestions and instructions. And the price is very fair. Stop looking - this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Works a bit better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this second light after learning that the cheaper ones are not in the right frequency to pick up cat urine. This one works SLIGHTLY better. Rather than "can barely see", is closer to "can almost see." It's still no where near the bright glowing stain I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: AKE

customer_reviews.title: works, but is chintzy, and may not work for long
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it does show the urine stains, has enough bulbs and whatnot. It is small, but works. However, the second day we used it, it, something broke inside, and makes it rather difficult to "click" on and off. We are managing to make it work for now. If it completely quits, we will see about an exchange or refund. An exchange could be frustrating, so I hope it doesn't come to that.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works a little TOO well...
customer_reviews.text: Brace yourself when you first use this little light. I had NO idea that things had gotten so out of hand, but, I kept smelling cat urine, and was I ever in for a surprise. I used the light in midday with the blinds closed and it still revealed all the hot spots my cats had created.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Flynn

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST AT FINDING CAT AND DOG URINE!!
customer_reviews.text: For now I am going to give this a 5 start review and add pictures to it later. The night we got it, we turned off the lights after dark and it found every single area of urine from the previous owner's dog and our 1 cat that has kidney failure. I've seen reviews where people suggest they can not find anything by using the light. I can't believe that because they show right up. Be certain it is after dark and lights are turned off for the best view. I know you will find them all. This little light has been a God-send to us. Photos later
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Best Light out there!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this last year when my elder cat started not using the litter box all the time. It worked great to find the places she went pee at. After she died (renal failure) :( I went around the house with most of the lights off and found a few more spots that i would have never guessed were there. The light works awesome and has the best wave length to light up those urine spots. If your want to see all the places you pet went pee at this is the light for you!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz T

customer_reviews.title: It works but only for the very top layer of a surface
customer_reviews.text: I have used it inside a car to detect urine stains on floor carpeting and seat upholstery. It DID detect stains that were treated before. It did NOT show deep stains that have been treated before, still produced a strong odor, and needed more treatments. For those you'll have to use your nose!
customer_reviews.author: Olga O

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a superior choice worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: I've owned UV lights before, this really DOES work better than the generic option I've chosen on Amazon. It is more expensive, but I believe this is absolutely worth it. I use to use the yellow glasses to improve visibility, but that is not necessary with this light. I have used it to find organic spills inside, including many things I couldn't see at all with my generic UV flashlight. I've also gone out to search for scorpions (for fun, not because I want them dead). This light illuminates scorpions from 20+ feet away!
customer_reviews.author: K Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: It’s nothing but a black light. I have a spot I KNOW my dog marks. I’ve scrubbed it but after a while the smell returns. It did not show a thing other than all the wire lint on my carpet. Might work if you don’t clean your carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Ike LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: UV light worked perfect. The one I used several years ago was so weak, light output wise, that even in a totally dark room finding "pet" stains was difficult. Quite the opposite with this UV light. As a matter of fact, I could stand straight and find my little pals boo-boos easily on a burgundy carpet.If you're looking for a good light at a very reasonable price, this is it! By the way, if you are looking to see how well your vacuum works, this light also shows up small particles as white specks on the floor and carpet (I used a UV light in a clean room application for just that purpose).
customer_reviews.author: William Vernisie

customer_reviews.title: Won't show cat pee
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help us find any cat pee spots that our anxious kitty left us on our carpet. Didn't work at all. We could find the spots better with our noses and even when shining on a spot we knew had cat pee there was zero difference. Save your money, it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: uijoonbug

customer_reviews.title: Requires Continuous Depressing of "On"
customer_reviews.text: With the lights in room off it works very well, but I have to keep pushing the "on" button for it to stay bright otherwise, the UV light keeps fading. The directions to put tape/post-its where you notice spots and then go back and treat them with the lights on is bad advice. By simply putting a marker, one cannot tell how large the are is or its contours. One needs the UV light on to see where to treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works to see cat pee on carpet a lot better than cheap ones!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look like the picture at all, but it does work to see cat pee on carpet better than the $5 UV light I had bought previously. Was going to include pictures but it's pretty hard to capture it well on my cell phone camera. The Peedar shows the spots about 3x better than the cheap light which is 395-400nm
customer_reviews.author: ian M

customer_reviews.title: Very effective - the best I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: This handy flashlight replaced a long tube style that was unwieldy. The PeeDar flashlight is very effective and we were able to determine the "trouble" spot for our newly-adopted cat with surprising ease. Read the instructions before use as distance from the surface and ambient light are factors in getting good results. I highly recommend the PeeDar flashlight, although I hope we don't have more occasions to have to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: origamian

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I already had another uv black light for detecting dog urine. When dogs get sick, this becomes an issue. I read forever trying to pick the perfect one, the perfect uv frequency, etc. It was helpful, but it had to be really dark & I had to wear my yellow glasses to do any detecting. The Peedar 2 is WAY different. It is SO much more powerful, SO much easier to see what needs to be seen. Now that I see the full picture, I think I'll pack up & move! Ha ha! Seriously, this is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: dog devotee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet and small people accident detections
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked! Not for the faint of heart. You may think you clean your bathroom really well but this light just might make you cringe. I used it to make sure I had found any pet accidents and properly cleaned them. In the day light, things lit up like a star. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T.

customer_reviews.title: Pet Owner Must-Have!
customer_reviews.text: The sellers are amazing with follow up emails. They provide additional hints to use the device, which, by the way is a must have for every pet owner. I used it with my carpet cleaner guy and all stains are gone! Thanks for terrific service and product! Additionally, it's been about a week since using the PeeDar and cleaning the carpets and my little Ella has yet to "mark" ANY area! Having this device handy makes it possible to always get any stain and ALL of it.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in finding urine or other hazards in your home or hotel. It shows things you never knew existed. It does show dust or other items also that stands out with this light, so it may not be urine or other but you can see dust particles different than urine or other fluids. It works great, but don't use it if you don't want to see what is really there. Would be great for hotels and stuff, but you may not want to stay in a hotel if using one of these either as you may see more than you want to see.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dale A. Stagg

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: All the spots glowed and the whole floor is covered with spots. The paint glowed. The drywall mud droppings glowed. And the prior owner had poured enzyme solution everywhere and that ALL glowed.
customer_reviews.author: BMore

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT if you actually want to know the truth
customer_reviews.text: Very scary what you see!! It works that well!! I always felt like my house had a faint smell of urine even though we cleaned really well after every accident. I bought the PeeDar and found out why. There were several entire accidents that we had not known were there that had dried months ago. I cleaned them all up and now my house smells wonderful. I feel so much better. It was totally disgusting, but now I'm confident that I have the house really clean. I haven't used it for anything else yet, but it's worth it just for this use. Way better than the cheaper made lights I bought before. Love it. Love it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TexasZooMom

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: My new two year old cat is taking awhile getting use to a litter box. I was at wits end smelling the urine but not being able to find it. Now I can find it super easy.. Super easy to use and sure saves me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Christine J.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and effective
customer_reviews.text: This light appears the dimmer than other lights, but that’s because the light is mostly outside of the school spectrum. It lights up cat pee and other stains incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a similar light that claims to detect pet urine and it didn’t work. I was desperate and after reading the reviews I purchased the Peedar. It worked so well I went over to my sisters and parents house to show them how well it worked! I would highly recommend this for anyone with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Execellent detection
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased UV detectors before, but this one is much better at detection. It's very small, but it is easy to store and use when I need it. It does pick up more than pet accidents which is not bad - but the light is different so you know it's not your pet's doing.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Learn From Me: Read Reviews Before Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate to find anything that would provide assistance to our cat spraying problem, so I brought this hoping it would help. I followed the instructions and even bought some yellow glasses to accompany this purchase, but still it didn’t not work the way I had hoped. It did work with freshly wet urine, however that defeated the purpose of my intent of using it with dry urine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Icky Revelations
customer_reviews.text: This item works perfectly, even if it does reveal all the gross stuff on your rugs and floors! I ordered this because I couldn't accurately find the cat urine we're trying to be rid of. The PeeDar UV flashlight revealed where it was PLUS a bunch of other surprising pet stains! Even though it's an icky revelation, we feel we are on our way to eliminating ALL the hidden pet stains we found using this UV flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Riverblues

customer_reviews.title: ... the aggravation of endlessly trying to find where your favorite pet is soiling your carpet
customer_reviews.text: Save the aggravation of endlessly trying to find where your favorite pet is soiling your carpet. This works better than advertised, wish I would have bought this a long time ago. It finds urine and other animal accidents on all types of household surfaces, just make sure the room is mostly dark when using the Peedar. If you have pets, it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Where is the pee?
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this urine detector. I’m always congested but even I could smell the strong scent of cat urine. The detector didn’t show any urine stains. I wish I had my Old urine detector which worked perfectly. I did get rid of the odor mopping the tile floor over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too good.
customer_reviews.text: This wavelength of light picks up literally everything. I have a hard time distinguishing between old wax on the floor, spills and urine. Maybe if your house and floors are cleaner than mine you'll have better luck lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: llow. Nothing will clean it I bet it is the vinegar I use for cleaning. Product could use better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Sometimes hard to distinguish between urine or other substances. I am dealing with spraying and it's pretty obvious when there is a bright yellow splatter on the wall. On the floor not always as easy to detect. You just mentioned bright yellow could be cleaner. It's been driving me crazy that my baseboard in my kitchen is bright ye
customer_reviews.author: Catloverof5

customer_reviews.title: Top notch and worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I know it's important to find the right UV wavelength, brightness, etc! This thing works even when it's not 100% dark. Don't risk the others that don't, be certain you don't need to return it to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Trainer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really wonderful product, it does exactly what it says it does. It deserves more than five stars. I have three cats, and I bought this because I suspected that one of my cats had started marking, but I wasn't able to tell exactly where. This showed me everything - you can easily tell the difference between past stains and recent stains. Be sure to wear your sunglasses, and the room needs to be darkish (it says totally dark but it doesn't need to be, I have streetlights and a full moon and the spots all showed up with no problems). This is great because it will show you exactly where that odd smell is coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. I use this flashlight to find where my cat has peed on the carpet so I can clean it up. It doesn't appear very bright, but I don't think it needs to be to show where urine is. The urine spots show up as bright greenish yellow under the light.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us...even where puppy had just had an accident.
customer_reviews.text: We have had our puppy for 2 weeks (she's now 10 weeks old and NOT potty trained yet). I have seen where she's squatted and piddled before I could get to her on time, so I know there's urine to be had. However, when I used this detector, it doesn't show anything. I made sure it was pitch dark in the room, as instructed, but it still doesn't show anything. Our carpet is cinnamon in color, so perhaps that's the issue...sure wish it worked for us!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mummert

customer_reviews.title: It finds everything
customer_reviews.text: It finds everything so be prepared. I bought this so I could find and pre-treat cat pee spots before cleaning my carpets. If you know the general area where your pet is going, then this light will find it. It's bright enough that you don't need the room to be completely dark and you don't need to wear any special glasses. Just not sure that the wavelength is specific only to urine. Looks like it picks up a lot of substances including certain types of cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: SheldonP

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to the original
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed in the performance of the original PeeDar, but all of my concerns about it have been addressed in this update. This unit is much brighter and easier to use for finding dried urine. It even is somewhat usable indoors in the daytime, where the original PeeDar needed almost absolute darkness, a keen eye, and more patience than I could muster with a spray bottle in the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Trussell

customer_reviews.title: be prepared!!
customer_reviews.text: Like a CSI crime scene, I found more than I bargained for! This light is no joke, you'll find all kinds of things. I found the urine I was looking for and was able to take my carpet cleaner to it right away. Yay! I then started shining it all over the place; walls, bathrooms, kitchen. I just moved into a new house and it'd a little disturbing to find drips and smudges and spots all over. This little, high powered light will turn me into an OCD clean freak.
customer_reviews.author: A Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works really well! Perfect tool for parents or pet owners.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this UV flashlight! It has exposed urine stains from my toddler that were hidden in the carpet. Now I know exactly where to clean! This light is worth the price. I checked out other lights and decided a few dollars more are worth having the quality this light provides. I will admit, I've learned more about my house and what is hiding in it than I ever wanted to know. You'll have to reign in your morbid curiosity if you dont want to be disgusted with various places. (like the kids bathroom!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I can't say that this worked for me, at all. By the time I removed all traces of ambient light, I could barely find the targeted areas. When I did, nothing glowed, although I know, for certain, that the areas in question had been affected. I 'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: So I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I received the light, but not the book. Without the book, it is not helpful since it illuminates everything. I even put some spilled coffee on the counter and it illuminated it I believe there are different types of illumination but since I did not receive the book, I have no comparison. So I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: resturust

customer_reviews.title: How did I live with out this!
customer_reviews.text: Cat pee can hide no longer! I knew their was a "hot" spot in my room. The light found it. Must have for cat owners with a cat have likes to tag things.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I know to watch him carefully when it rains because he doesn't like to go out when it's raining
customer_reviews.text: I excited to finally get a product that would help me find the stains my male mini schnauzer leave around house. I know to watch him carefully when it rains because he doesn't like to go out when it's raining. When I got the product. It did not work. I even removed the batteries and replaced them back in and it didn't work. I tried a new set of batteries and it still didn't work. I was so disappointed. I returned the product. I'm happy that the majority of you had a good experience with the product. I would like to try it again but don't want to go through purchasing one and it not work.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Prindle

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 home investment I've made, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new house and quickly discovered there was prevalent dog urine throughout the carpeted areas. The PeeDar 2.0 was a very helpful tool to document the extent and location of the stains. Interestingly, we also had a professional eradication contractor come in and look at it, and the PeeDar worked better than his expensive black lights he brought with him! Even he was surprised at how well the little PeeDar performed. The short-wavelength UV works much better in low-light (not totally dark) conditions compared to the big commercial lights. Those also require yellow glasses to really see everything; the PeeDar does not. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtiescycles

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it in today. My cats have been having trouble being around each other and had begun spraying in the house. It works perfectly to find spots I may have missed while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Huggins

customer_reviews.title: I confirmed it does detect dog urine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to go what it claims. My dog had urinated on a puppy pad and once dry I checked it with the light. It did indeed glow (see picture). I would say that it does work with dog urine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hytken

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item That Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This really works. As volunteers at an animal charity, we use this detector all of the time. other types of detectors work marginally. This one is 100% effective. For Best Results: Use non- rechargeable batteries. This light works best when batteries are fully charged. Rechargeable batteries never fully recharge to their original strength. We've tried both ways, so we know.
customer_reviews.author: CoFCC, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: The flashlight technically works, meaning it shows where cat ...
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight technically works, meaning it shows where cat urine is on the carpet. However, after using it 1-2 times, it wouldn't turn off. It should last longer than that before malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFaninVA

customer_reviews.title: Cat urine spotter
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in order to determine where one of our cats was spraying in our house. This worked really well and is much better than a standard black light.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Morris

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little scary how well this light works. I have an older cat that was having kidney issues and this helped me identify the pee spots for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS IN YOUR OWN RESTROOM
customer_reviews.text: You will never be able to scrub the shame off your walls This works amazingly well. Spots on the carpet from cat barf also show up, so my weekend was spent running a carpet cleaner across the living room. It works way better than blacklights at lighting up glow-in-the-dark and fluorescent things. I did not regret this purchase (unlike the regular blacklight flashlights)
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This light works - maybe too well. My husband wishes I never would have purchased as I've become obsessed with examining every inch of carpet. Although it works best in the dark, it still works in a dimly lit room. Because of this light I realized my dog had used our living room rug as her personal yard and replaced. House feels cleaner already!
customer_reviews.author: LSJ

customer_reviews.title: Works even on an odd carpet color
customer_reviews.text: We installed new caramel colored carpet a couple of years ago. I have cats and have used a black light for years to find pet stains. For the first time, my existing black light did not show *anything* on the new carpet color -- even when I knew a stain was there. I tried purchasing several other versions of black/uv lights without success. This PeeDar is the only one that works! I'm not particularly happy that there are stains in my house, but I'm glad that I'm finally able to find them to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Hjermstad

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite effective and has other uses like revealing how well vacuumed a carpet is.
customer_reviews.text: So far with my initial use it seems to work well. It is also useful to determine how well a carpet has been vacuumed and what areas were missed as dirt particles fluoresce well. Thanks for the emails with additional tips for using the product. Further using it, it works! Needed to buy some UV clear glasses but should have purchased them with the flashlight. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael James

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used other lights before and this one is much better. It is very bright and makes it really easy to find what you are looking for. The batteries seem to last quite a while too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: The flashlight works a lot better than my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Received it in 2 days, used it at once and very disappointed in my dog as a result. The flashlight works just as advertised, and my dog went about 10 times where I thought she might have gone once. The backlight does work.
customer_reviews.author: miker

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with any other black light this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought small UV black lights for finding pet stains, but you had to crawl on the floor for them to be close enough to work. NOT THIS ONE, it is very bright and I can walk around and find the stains, instead of crawl around. This is a great buy! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jsimmons74

customer_reviews.title: You already contacted me!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, you sent me a detailed message about my flashlight and my problem finding the pet urine....giving me some pointers to try. It works great on human urine (toilets) and dust/dirt...just having problems with the dogs’ “deposits”.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B. Siegal

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there was a really bad odor in our home for awhile, I thought it was cat pee but it turns out it was a really stinky tree in the backyard. Regardless, this little light works great. I used it all over the place and could actually see places on the countertops where I had missed when cleaning and it illuminated the pollen that had been coming in through the windows. I thought I had cleaned really well, but what I had not picked up with the vacuum or mop glowed brightly under the light and I was able to clean that.
customer_reviews.author: Alison F

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have this type of issue!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great!! I’ve used it on carpet and ceramic tile and you can definitely see where the urine is. So glad to have this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Markin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a 2 year warranty. It cost more not made any better than lower price black light
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ability to show every imperfection in our carpet. Is quite depressing but sure does work well! Only negative was that supplied batteries were flat. Highly recommended purchase to remove the guesswork.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It shows you things you'll want to forget
customer_reviews.text: Nobody likes to have need one of these, but one has to be glad when it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ogawa

customer_reviews.title: works great on dry stains
customer_reviews.text: works great for locating cat pee and vomit and spilled wet food and just about anything gross you would want to clean up that's invisible. Just a note cat urine is hardly detectable with this until its dry ,but then its easy.
customer_reviews.author: t.b.

customer_reviews.title: Time for a Carpet Cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. It was a little smaller than I expected, but I guess when viewing the associated pictures, it's relative size compared to the batteries is accurate. We recently added a yorkie puppie to our family and we wish we would have had this item on Day 1! I'd say this is a must have for all new pet owners that want to keep their carpets in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Croat23

customer_reviews.title: works like it is stated.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice help for detecting messy spots. Many want to complain about the brightness. It is bright in the spectrum that it puts out. If you point it at something that will shine back like a black light does. You will see just how bright it really is. It just means that you need to look a little closer or spend a lot more money for a professional one. Just my thoughts. I am very satisfied and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: PeeDar helped save my Carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was having trouble identifying where cat urine smell was coming from. I had identified some spots, but Even though Natures Miracle cat urine odor eliminator, removed the odor from those spots, the room stilled smelled. By using the PeeDar I was able to identify the spot I missed and eliminate the odor. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: cjbc

customer_reviews.title: Works great to search for dog pee.
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as it is dark, the beam is pretty wide. I've found that wood stain shows up with the light so it is harder to find pee spots on hardwood floors but it is doable. I use it to search my entire house. One thing that would be nice would be a listing of what types of things show up and what things do not.
customer_reviews.author: ControlsGirl

customer_reviews.title: This little light works great! However we were grossed out at how well ...
customer_reviews.text: Be Prepared! This little light works great! However we were grossed out at how well it worked and did not realize how bad our carpet was with pet stains to point we are just going to replace the carpet. And then take it into your bathroom and you well have your bleach out cleaning the toilet . This light even works in the daylight but of course shows up much better at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tod S.

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to determine where she has had an accident before
customer_reviews.text: Get ready to be in shock when you use the Peedar 2.0. I knew my dog has had a few accidents in my house but I never imaged it was more than 2-3. As soon as I turned it in on I could immediately see all the different spots throughout the house. It was very easy to determine where she has had an accident before. The spots glowed super bright. I wasted my money on a cheaper black light that did not work at all. So skip any other black light you may be thinking about and purchase this one. It really does work!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Maya

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: We used this light for cat urine and it was definitely helpful! I feel much better now that we are able to see and not only smell problem spots. I have also dropped it a couple of times and it still works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After I read an article that said 380-385nm was the perfect spectrum, I checked the product that I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with two sick cats inappropriately urinating on carpet. I purchased a similar product for a similar price that claimed to illuminate urine. It did not and so I was convinced that their urine just did not show up for some reason or my dark brown carpet hampered detection. After I read an article that said 380-385nm was the perfect spectrum, I checked the product that I was using and it was closer to 400nm (which worked fine for vomit, but not urine). I immediately ordered the PeeDar and was overjoyed to find that it does illuminate my cats' urine!!! If only I had known earlier! This product is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sue J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay at full brightness
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturing quality on the light I got is just OK. The wavelength works as described and will light up pee spots. But, the physical light output on the flash light will drop in brightness a few seconds after turning on. If I shake or tap the flashlight it will go back to full brightness and than drop again. The product obviously works, but is very annoying to have to keep tapping or shaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: PeeDar 2.0 works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few black lights before this to find urine spots, never with any success. This one works. It is amazing how well it lights up the spots. I would recommend it to anyone with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bohler

customer_reviews.title: It does find the pet pee. Don't use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It does find the pet pee. Don't use it if you don't want to see all the places your animals have peed in your house. ***EDIT** Switch constantly breaks. I would NEVER purchase this light again. I rarely write bad reviews or edit my good ones. This light is junk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Seriously works! (Love the name!)
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely works! Must be used in complete darkness. I did not believe that my cat was peeing everywhere, but this litte light showed me otherwise. I have been treating the areas that the light illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much a waste of money and did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much a waste of money and did not work as advertised. Would not show pet urine in known contaminated areas easily identifiable with other lamps.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT E. BRUNNER

customer_reviews.title: If your cat has been marking, use this!
customer_reviews.text: Helped find all the places where my cat had been marking!
customer_reviews.author: cccane1

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this highly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a life saver!, whenever we have family over with fur babies because of marking territory peed throughout our house we could smell it every time we left and came back home. It bothered me that I didn't know where but could smell the urine everywhere. Bought this and omg! Absolutely a God send! Walked through the house dark and wow! Found and could clearly see all the spots so I knew exactly where to deep clean!, Recommend this highly! It turned into a game like a treasure hunt to go find the evidence. 😜😜
customer_reviews.author: JANISE

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the PeeDar 2.0 I just got. The description of the color wavelengths is true. I tried it one on one with a similar light (equally bright) I got last year at the pet store. The carpet stain was much easier to detect with the PeeDar as it provided noticeably better contrast. Both lights were equally good at checking paper currency for security markings. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bos

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have 4 cats and 2 dogs. I know where approximately my older cat started to go and wondered if there were anymore. This light DOES show cat urine, hairball stains (I thought were cleaned up, couldn't see with naked eye). The stains were either very fluorescent or an off yellow color. When showing my husband he could not see very obvious stain
customer_reviews.author: Terry E Czajka

customer_reviews.title: Pee Light
customer_reviews.text: after using the light I was ready to strangle our dog. Of course I mean this figuratively she is after all a highlight in our family, It allow me to better control her access around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D Zottarelli

customer_reviews.title: Most useful when the room is not sunny or later in the day. Now, if it would just ‘zap’ my pup...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use to track my naughty boy pup! It is accurate, very ‘enlightening’, and will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Coventry

customer_reviews.title: Despite other reviews, worked on cat pee for us
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this since some reviews mentioned that it didn’t work on cat pee, which is what I needed it for. It definitely worked for us though. I found lots of interesting stains throughout my house!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and yet I hate it. It does it job extremely well (it shows urine stains as well as water stains in a neon-ish yellow-green color) , feels sturdy and does with a wrist strap. So, why do I hate it? Let's just say that I'm on a full-blown cleaning spree now, starting with the bathrooms, all because I pointed the light towards the toilet. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Mishell

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. We have a large golden retriever who spends an inordinate amount of time in Puget Sound consuming lots of water. (Who know dogs liked to drink salt water.) As a result, we didn't get her out an extra time and she had an "accident" on a wool rug. This product let us easily see where the problem was and treat it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Merry

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is really good
customer_reviews.text: It really shows the urine, and all that other dirt on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Cool Amazone

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE LIGHT RECEIVED
customer_reviews.text: Just got my light in the mail; installed batteries; and it worked for less than one minute! Contacted the OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE DEPARTMENT and they promptly sent me a new light, along with apologies! This product is amazing; and it really WORKS GREAT! I highly recommend this purchase! Cannot imagine going without it, now! Very helpful with new carpeting and pets in house! Many thanks and grateful this company strives to satisfy its customers! Thank you for your prompt handling in this matter, as well! Will refer this product to all my pet lover friends!
customer_reviews.author: Toria

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This light works really well. I was even able to use it during the daytime in areas that we're not getting direct sunlight. Didn't seem cheap, was easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Trogvissa

product_meta.title: PeeDar 2.0 UV Pet Urine Detector Black Light Flashlight + Cat & Dog Behaviorist Book + 3 AAAs. Ultra Bright Optimal 380-385NM LEDs Find Invisible Stains Instantly! Rid Cat, Dog Pee Issues Forever.

More Effective Optimized UV Wavelength: 380-385NM Outperforms Other Brand's 395NM. (ZERO Overpowering Purple Light For A Greater Contrast of Stain Vs Background)
21 LEDs - 9 More Than Our Top Competitors - Stains Glow BRIGHTER*
3 x AAA Trusted Brand (Duracell) Batteries PROVIDED - Start Your Hunt Right Out Of The Box!
Finally, Banish All Your Stains Forever! - INCLUDED: Exclusive Expert Pet Behaviorist eBook - Everything You Need To Stop The Source Of The Problem Once & For All!
